issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Running hive --orcfiledump fails with "Missing CLI jar"
fields.summary: Orc FileDump fails with Missing CLI jar

comments.body: [~xuefuz]/[~Ferd] HIVE-10624 broke other tools orcfiledump/rcfilecat etc. Can some of you review this patch as you guys have more context on this issue?

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12768390/HIVE-12246.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to build exiting with an error

Test results: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build/5769/testReport
Console output: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build/5769/console
Test logs: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build-5769/
